string.name: hiUser
string.comment: %s is the title+username e.g. 'GM ABC' or simply ABC if there is no title

string.name: awaitQuestion
string.comment: Displayed while waiting for results and also as a notification.

resources.string: 您这国际象棋的一年真是精彩纷呈！

string.name: gamesYouWon
string.comment: %s is the number of games won

string.name: timeSpentPlayingExclam
string.comment: %s is the time spent playing animated from 0 e.g. '1 day, 17 hours'. The time is also translated

resources.string: 这个对局量看起来挺合理的。
这么多时间，您一共走了多少步棋？

string.name: movesOfWoodPushed
string.comment: %s is a weight in grams or kilograms

resources.string: 这相当于推动了 %s 的木头！
标准棋子的重量大约是每颗 40 克

string.name: firstMoveStats
string.comment: Subtitle to your most played move e.g. '1. e4'. %s is the number of games played and its percentage in parentheses. e.g. '50 (67%)'

resources.string: 这是您执白时，%s 对局的开局方式

plurals.name: openingsMostPlayedAsWhite
plurals.item: 您执白时最常使用的开局，共 %s 局

plurals.name: openingsMostPlayedAsBlack
plurals.item: 您执黑时最常使用的开局，共 %s 局

plurals.name: puzzlesThanksVoting
plurals.comment: %s is the number of puzzles. It is also translated.
plurals.item: 感谢您对 %s 道谜题进行了投票。

string.name: puzzlesHelpedTagging
string.comment: To tag in this context is to categorise the themes the puzzles fit into. %s is a number e.g. 5

resources.string: 您还帮忙为其中的 %s 道打了标签。
今年您还没有解答过任何谜题。

string.name: puzzlesTryNow
string.comment: This is context of a user who did not solve any puzzles in the past year. This is a call to action, inviting them to try Lichess puzzles.

string.name: puzzlesYouWonOnFirstTry
string.comment: %s is the number of puzzles the user successfully solved that year.

resources.string: 其中有 %s 道您一次就解对了！
您常玩什么时限和棋类变体？

string.name: malwareNoneLoaded
string.comment: %s is 0

resources.string: 已加载 %s 个广告与跟踪器
我们没有出售您的个人数据
我们没有利用您的设备攻击您

string.name: malwareWarningPrefix
string.comment: %s is 'be careful'

resources.string: 但其他网站会这样做，所以请您 %s。

string.name: malwareWarningCta
string.comment: It is a link to https://lichess.org/ads

string.name: lichessGamesPlayedIn
string.comment: lichessGamesPlayedIn %1$s is the number of games, %2$s is the year of the recap.

resources.string: %2$s 年，在 Lichess 上共进行了 %1$s 局对弈

string.name: lichessGamesOfThemYours
string.comment: %s is the percentage of games that are yours, out of all Lichess games.

resources.string: 感谢您在 Lichess 上对弈！

string.name: thanksHaveAGreat
string.comment: thanksHaveAGreat %s is the next year as a numeral (e.g. in 2025, the next year was 2026, so 2026 was displayed on this screen)

resources.string: 我们很高兴您在这里。祝您 %s 愉快！

string.name: patronCostsThisYear
string.comment: %1$s is 'costs', translatable separately. %2$s is a monetary amount with a currency symbol e.g. "$750,000". The amount is localised automatically according to language and location, e.g. in France it would be rendered "678 750 €", and in the UK as "£589,539"

string.name: patronCosts
string.comment:
Part of a longer sentence "Lichess's costs this year were <monetary amount in local currency>."
The text links to lichess.org/costs

resources.string: 我们是一家非营利机构，完全依靠赞助运作。

string.name: patronConsiderDonating
string.comment: %s is 'supporting us with a donation'. Appears if you are not currently a Patron (donor).

resources.string: 如果今年我们为您带来了欢乐，或者您认同我们的工作，请考虑 %s！

string.name: patronMakeDonation
string.comment:
Part of a longer sentence, translatable separately: "If we helped entertain you this year, or you believe in our work, please consider supporting us with a donation!"
The text links to https://lichess.org/patron - so it should ideally be phrased as a call to action.
Appears if you are not currently a Patron (donor).

string.name: shareableTitle
string.comment: %s is the current year

string.name: shareableSpentPlaying
string.comment: subtitle to the translated time they have spent playing

string.name: recapReady
string.comment:
%s is the year of the recap
Appears as a notification.

resources.string: 您的 %s 年度回顾已就绪！
